title: [有圖]  i Tunes無法驗證伺服器

replies.msg:
本來用開舊機WIN8入歌
一直以嚟都無問題
點知用新機(WIN7)想同步嗰陣彈左呢舊野出嚟

GOOGLE完都搵唔到答案點整
有無巴打知點攪
睇黎巴打都好多game下 又cs又uplay又origin咁

1/26/17
Original Poster
Google user
Dear Zarah,
PROBLEM SOLVED!
Thank you for your response. I simultaneously sent notice of this issue to both Google Chrome Help Forum and Apple Support. I heard from Apple support yesterday and they were able to solve my issue. Should anyone else encounter this issue, here is what they had me do which worked perfectly for me:
In Google Chrome Extensions I disabled both AdBlock and Norton Security Tool Bar. I then was able to sync my iPad 2 to my PC after which I then re-enabled both of these extensions. Everything appears to be back to normal including receiving yesterday’s Chrome update to Version 56.0.2924.76 (64-bit). Please let me know if you would like me to provide additional information about my system.
Thank you again.


一搵就搵到 少少英文都懶睇真係幫你唔到

1/26/17
Original Poster
Google user
